<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Willowside Gazetteer](/Articles.aspx?ID=16)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #154: Siege of the Dinosaurs](/Sources.aspx?ID=31) pg. 66</row>

Desperately struggling against the creeping desolation of the Welt, Willowside has more than its share of mysteries, unusual personalities, and bloody history.
